application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
decision_conditions: The replacement trees for G1 must be planted on or near the existing trees by April 2026; the tree should be of x1 Birch (Betula spp.) and x1 Cherry (Prunus spp.) that is more suited to the site and of a size not less than 10-12cm girth when planted.

Reason: To ensure the continued amenity provided by the tree(s) and the planting of an appropriate species and in order to preserve the character and appearance of this part of Ealing Green conservation area. | The tree work specified above must be carried out within 2 years of the date of this decision.

Reason: To ensure the work is only carried out once in respect of this consent and allow Ealing Council the opportunity to reconsider its decision in the light of prevailing circumstances, and reconsult on the case in the event of the consent expiring before implementation.
description:
TPO 461 
(G1) 2 x Ash - Reduce height by 5 metres; reshape.
(G2) 3 x Cherries - Reduce height by 3 metres and thin.
rear of 24-27 
(G3) 4 x Limes - Reduce by 3 metres; reshape; thin by 30%; lift to 25 metres; cyclical maintenance.
by garage 
(T1) 1 x Ash - Fell; poison root (disrupting paving)
by bin store 
(G4) 2 x Ash - Fell: poison root.
